name: Phishing
description: Adversaries may send phishing messages to gain access to victim systems
detection: Network and/or mail server analysis, email gateway filtering

mitigations.name: Antivirus/Antimalware
mitigations.description: Use anti-virus signatures and detection for phishing content

mitigations.name: Network Intrusion Prevention
mitigations.description: Use network signatures to identify phishing traffic

name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
description: Adversaries may abuse command and script interpreters to execute commands
detection: Monitor executed commands and arguments, script execution logs

mitigations.name: Execution Prevention
mitigations.description: Block execution of potentially malicious scripts

mitigations.name: Privileged Account Management
mitigations.description: Restrict script execution to privileged accounts only

name: Scheduled Task/Job
description: Adversaries may abuse task scheduling to execute programs at system startup
detection: Monitor scheduled task creation, modifications to task scheduler

mitigations.name: Operating System Configuration
mitigations.description: Configure OS to prevent unauthorized task scheduling

name: Account Discovery
description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of accounts on a system or domain
detection: Monitor process and command-line arguments for account discovery actions

mitigations.name: Operating System Configuration
mitigations.description: Prevent access to account listing commands

name: Application Layer Protocol
description: Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols
detection: Analyze network data for uncommon data flows, protocol misuse

mitigations.name: Network Intrusion Prevention
mitigations.description: Use network intrusion prevention to detect malicious protocol usage
